name: Cube Party
description:
Uh Oh! Mr. Red and Mr. Blue are mad at each other and they won't stop fighting! Play as Mr. Red and Mr. Blue and fight each other to the deaths! Enjoying playing this local multiplayer game! The controls are arrow keys for Mr. Red and WASD for Mr. Blue. Q shoots for Mr. Blue and M shoots for Mr. Red. Enjoying playing and learning skill! Tools used:

Unity 2018.3

Google Drawings
